question.q:
What is the Vanguard L4®
Diafiltration Process?

answers.a:
<36a>I’m not really sure – but now that I’ve
tried it - I feel 10 years younger!</36a>

<36a>Something a whole lot better
than the L3 version…</36a>

<36a>A manufacturing process designed to
help remove extraneous proteins from Vanguard L4 vaccines</36a>

question.q:
Vanguard L4®’s microfiltration process designed to reduce extraneous proteins is
referred to as:

How many times are
the Lepto fractions in
Vanguard L4® microfiltered?
Vanguard L4® vaccines immunize dogs against which 4 different Leptospira serovars?

answers.a:
<36>L. canicola, L. grippotyphosa,
L. icterohaemorrhagiae
and L. pomona</36>

<36>L. canicola, L. grippotyphosa,
L. icterohaemorrhagiae
and L. autumnalis</36>

<36>L. canicola, L. grippotyphosa,
L. icterohaemorrhagiae
and L. bratislava</36>

<36>L. canicola, L. grippotyphosa,
L. icterohaemorrhagiae
and L. hardjo</36>

question.q:
Laboratory and field studies have shown Vanguard L4® vaccines to
be safe in pups as young as:
